system.description:
Your position affords you a staff of your own. You gain two followers chosen from the following list:

  • Apothecary

  • Bodyguard

  • Cryptographer

  • Diviner

  • Operative

  • Interpreter

  • Sage

If one of these followers leaves your service or perishes, you may choose another follower of one of the types on this list to replace them after a week has passed.
